TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi FileListBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ListBox

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 查找并列出在运行时由 属性指定的目录中的文件。

span.span: Locates and lists files in the directory specified by the property at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此控件显示的文件选择的文件类型的列表。Use this control to display a list of files selected by file type. 可以创建的对话框应用程序中，例如，使用户能够选择文件组。You can create dialog boxes in your application that, for example, enable the user to select a file or group of files. 如果还显示并控件，可以编写代码以将它们与同步`FileListBox`控件以及相互。If you also display the and controls, you can write code to synchronize them with the `FileListBox` control and with each other. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个`FileListBox`在运行时显示给定目录中的文件的列表。A `FileListBox` displays a list of files in a given directory at run time. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Archive { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Archive : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定 控件是否显示具有 特性的文件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether a control displays files that have attributes.

value.span: 如果将显示具有 特性的文件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if files that have the attribute will be displayed; otherwise .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定要在中显示的文件类型控件中，基于标准`Archive`操作环境中使用的文件特性。Use this property to specify the type of files to display in a control, based on standard `Archive` file attribute used in the operating environment. 在运行的时重置的代码中设置此属性控件来显示具有指定的属性的那些文件。Setting this property in code at run time resets the control to display only those files that have the specified attribute. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnDoubleClick(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnDoubleClick (e As EventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). `OnDoubleClick`方法还可使派生的类处理事件，而不必附加委托。The `OnDoubleClick` method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Path : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的当前路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the current path for a .

value.span: 一个 ，包含当前路径，但不包括文件名。

span.span: A that contains the current path, not including the file name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`Path`属性是一个字符串，指示路径，如 C:\Ob 或 C:\Windows\System。The value of the `Path` property is a string indicating a path, such as C:\Ob or C:\Windows\System. 有关控件，则默认值为当前路径在运行时创建控件。For a control, the default is the current path when the control is created at run time. 在生成应用程序的文件浏览和操作功能时，请使用此属性。Use this property when you are building an application's file-browsing and manipulation capabilities. 设置`Path`属性具有效果类似于 MS-DOS`chdir`命令; 使用或不指定驱动器允许相对路径。Setting the `Path` property has effects similar to the MS-DOS `chdir` command; relative paths are allowed with or without a drive specification. 使用冒号 （:） 指定只有驱动器选择该驱动器上的当前目录。Specifying only a drive with a colon (:) selects the current directory on that drive. `Path`属性也为限定的网络路径而无需使用以下语法的驱动器连接设置：The `Path` property can also be set to a qualified network path without a drive connection using the following syntax: ``` \\servername\sharename\path ``` 更改的值`Path`有关控件生成事件。Changing the value of `Path` for a control generates an event. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

summary.span: 在代码中设置 或 属性以更改路径时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the path is changed by setting the or property in code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用`PathChange`事件过程中以响应路径中的更改控件。You can use a `PathChange` event procedure to respond to path changes in a control. 当您将其分配一个字符串，包含的新路径属性，控件调用`PathChange`事件。When you assign a string that contains a new path to the property, the control invokes the `PathChange` event. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Pattern { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Pattern : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示运行时在 控件中显示的文件名。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the file names displayed in a control at run time.

value.span: 字符串表达式，该值指示文件规范，如"\*。\*"或"\*。移除"。

span.span: A string expression indicating a file specification, such as "\*.\*" or "\*.FRM".

value.span: 默认值是"\*。\*"，这会返回所有文件的列表。

span.span: The default is "\*.\*", which returns a list of all files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Pattern`属性扮演着关键角色在设计应用程序的文件浏览和操作功能。The `Pattern` property plays a key role in designing an application's file-browsing and manipulation capabilities. 使用`Pattern`与其他文件控件属性，以便浏览文件或一组类似文件的用户方法结合使用。Use `Pattern` in combination with other file-control properties to give the user ways to explore files or groups of similar files. 例如，专用于启动其他程序的应用程序，可以指定唯一的.exe 文件的文件列表框 (\*.exe) 中显示出来。For example, in an application dedicated to starting other programs, you could designate that only .exe files be displayed in the file list box (\*.exe). 除了使用通配符字符，还可以使用分号 （;） 分隔的多个模式。In addition to using wildcard characters, you can also use multiple patterns separated by semicolons (;). 例如，"*.exe;*.bat"将返回所有可执行文件和所有 MS-DOS 批处理文件的列表。For example, "*.exe; *.bat" would return a list of all executable files and all MS-DOS batch files. 更改的值`Pattern`属性生成事件。Changing the value of the `Pattern` property generates a event. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

summary.span: 在代码中设置 或 属性以更改文件列表模式（如“*.\*”）时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the file listing pattern, such as "*.\*", is changed by setting the or property in code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用`PatternChange`事件过程中以响应模式中的更改控件。You can use a `PatternChange` event procedure to respond to pattern changes in a control. 当您将其分配一个字符串，包含的新模式属性，FileListBox 调用事件。When you assign a string that contains a new pattern to the property, the FileListBox invokes the event. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReadOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ReadOnly : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定 控件是否包含具有只读特性的文件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether a control contains files that have read-only attributes.

value.span: 如果将显示具有 特性的文件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if files that have the attribute will be displayed; otherwise .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`ReadOnly`属性控件指定或不具有只读属性的文件显示文件列表中。Use the `ReadOnly` property for a control to specify whether files that have read-only attributes are displayed in the file list or not. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性设置为`true`（默认值），将显示具有只读属性的文件而不考虑`ReadOnly`属性设置。If the property is set to `true` (the default), files that have read-only attributes are displayed regardless of the `ReadOnly` property setting. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 强制控件使其工作区无效并立即重绘自己。

span.span: Forces the control to invalidate its client area and immediately redraw itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

span.para: 当您重写在派生类中，请确保调用基类使失效，重绘该控件及其子控件的方法。
When you override in a derived class, make sure to call the method of the base class so the control and its child controls are invalidated and redrawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关控件，`Sorted`始终返回`false`。For the control, `Sorted` always returns `false`. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]
